books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.review: A captivating story about ambition, love, and the price of fame. Evelyn Hugo is a complex character whose story unfolds beautifully through the eyes of Monique. The writing is engaging and the plot twists are unexpected yet satisfying.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.review: An absolutely brilliant science fiction novel that combines humor, science, and heart. The protagonist's journey from confusion to understanding mirrors the reader's experience perfectly. Rocky is one of the most endearing alien characters ever written.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.review: A thought-provoking exploration of regret and the infinite possibilities of life. While the concept is fascinating, some of the alternate lives felt rushed. Still, it's a beautiful reminder that every choice matters.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.review: A stunning retelling of Greek mythology from Circe's perspective. Miller's prose is lyrical and the character development is masterful. This book made me fall in love with mythology all over again.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.review: A psychological thriller that keeps you guessing until the very end. The twist is genuinely surprising and well-executed. The pacing is perfect and the characters are well-developed.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.review: An incredible memoir about the power of education and self-determination. Westover's journey from isolation to academic achievement is both inspiring and heartbreaking. The writing is honest and raw.

books.title: Klara and the Sun
books.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
books.review: A beautiful and melancholic exploration of artificial intelligence and what it means to be human. Ishiguro's prose is elegant and the story raises important questions about love, consciousness, and mortality.

currentlyReading.title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
currentlyReading.author: V.E. Schwab

tbr.title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
tbr.author: TJ Klune
